channel.title: matlab on Getting Started
channel.description: Recent content in matlab on Getting Started

item.author: alejandro.moralesmartinez@ucsf.edu (Alejandro Morales Martinez)
item.description: Matlab Resources The servers have many versions of Matlab. Using Matlab is quite simple, all it requires is typing the following command into a terminal in a VNC server: matlab & The default matlab is usually R2015b, although this could change. In order to use a specific version, specify which version you would like to run: e.g. matlab_2013a & To check all versions of matlab available in the server, run the following command in a terminal: bash -c "compgen -c | grep -E '^matlab.
